part1000.publication_index.name: CR_EWH_2
part1000.publication_index.wg.number.publication_set_comments: Second change request to support Electrical Harness capability
part1000.publication_index.description: The modules that are to be added to Part1000 as part of change request CR_EWH_2 which contains further updates to support Electrical Harness capability. The STEPmod CVS repository should be tagged as: CR_EWH_2 before submitting the change request.
